room1.name: Starting Room
room1.description: A cozy room with stone walls and a warm fireplace. This appears to be the entrance to the dungeon.

room2.name: Corridor Junction
room2.description: A wide corridor with multiple paths leading in different directions. The stone floor is worn smooth from years of use.

room3.name: Ancient Library
room3.description: Dusty bookshelves line the walls of this room. Ancient tomes and scrolls fill the shelves, their contents long forgotten.

room4.name: Treasure Vault
room4.description: A secure vault with reinforced walls. Empty treasure chests and broken lock mechanisms suggest this room has been looted.

room5.name: Guard Room
room5.description: A room that once housed dungeon guards. Rusted weapons and armor are scattered about, along with the remains of a long-dead guard.

room6.name: Alchemy Laboratory
room6.description: A laboratory filled with bubbling potions and strange apparatus. The air is thick with the scent of herbs and chemicals.

room7.name: Stairwell Chamber
room7.description: A circular chamber with a spiral staircase leading down into darkness. The walls are adorned with ancient runes that glow faintly.

room8.name: Secret Passage
room8.description: A narrow passage hidden behind a false wall. Cobwebs hang from the ceiling, suggesting this path is rarely used.

room9.name: Throne Room
room9.description: An opulent chamber with a grand throne at the far end. Tattered banners hang from the walls, their colors faded with age.

room10.name: Dungeon Cell
room10.description: A small cell with iron bars and a heavy door. The walls are covered in scratch marks, evidence of desperate attempts to escape.

room11.name: Armory
room11.description: A room filled with racks of weapons and armor. Most are rusted and broken, but a few items still gleam with deadly purpose.

room12.name: Crypt
room12.description: A solemn chamber filled with stone sarcophagi. The air is cold and still, and the walls are adorned with funerary inscriptions.

room13.name: Temple
room13.description: A grand temple with towering columns and a central altar. Faded religious symbols decorate the walls and floor.

room14.name: Garden
room14.description: An underground garden with bioluminescent plants that provide a soft, ethereal light. The air is fresh and fragrant.

room15.name: Boss Chamber
room15.description: A massive chamber with a raised platform at the center. The walls are covered in ancient magical runes that pulse with power.
